title: The Legend of Zelda: Breath of the Wild
description: An open-world adventure game where you explore the kingdom of Hyrule, solving puzzles and defeating enemies.

title: The Witcher 3: Wild Hunt
description: An action RPG where you play as Geralt of Rivia, a monster hunter searching for his adopted daughter.

title: Red Dead Redemption 2
description: An open-world western adventure game set in 1899, where you explore a vast and detailed world.

title: Cyberpunk 2077
description: An open-world RPG set in the dystopian future of Night City, where you play as V, a mercenary with cybernetic enhancements.

title: God of War
description: An action-adventure game where you play as Kratos, a Spartan warrior on a journey with his son Atreus.

title: Horizon Zero Dawn
description: An action RPG set in a post-apocalyptic world overrun by robotic creatures, where you play as Aloy.

title: Fortnite
description: A battle royale game where 100 players fight to be the last one standing on a constantly shrinking map.

title: Minecraft
description: A sandbox game where you can build and explore your own virtual world, using blocks and resources.

title: Overwatch
description: A team-based multiplayer first-person shooter where players choose from a roster of heroes with unique abilities.

title: Dark Souls III
description: An action RPG known for its challenging gameplay and intricate world design, where you battle powerful enemies.
